Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 131st/Eberhart
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Roosevelt and Halsted
ShortDescription: Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and Halsted due to fire department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and Halsted due to fire department activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Midway and Halsted at this time.

Shuttle buses will  be available to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Roosevelt and 35th
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and 35th due to fire department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and 35th due to fire department activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Roosevelt and 35th at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between 35th and Adams-Wabash to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
